text: @Alyssa_Milano Just like Adam Schiff and Nancy Pelosi tied up resources during an impeachment fail while the coronavirus raged in China and now Bernie says he wouldn't close down travel. If the United States would have been prepared since the middle of the impeachment more lives saved.
